Name: Zoning, 281-311 Marcus Garvey Boulevard, Brooklyn (N 230147 ZRK)
Title: Application number N 230147 ZRK (281-311 Marcus Garvey Boulevard) submitted by Omni New York, LLC, pursuant to Section 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, modifying APPENDIX F for the purpose of establishing a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing area, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 3, Council District 36.

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
